resources.string: Spoof the app signature to prevent playback issues
Spoof the app signature to prevent playback issues

App signature spoofed

Side effects include:
• Enhanced bitrate is not available
• Videos cannot be downloaded
• No seekbar thumbnails for paid videos
App signature not spoofed\n\nVideo playback may not work
Turning off this setting will cause video playback issues.

App signature spoofed for feed videos

Side effects include:
• Feed videos are missing subtitles
• Automatically played feed videos will show up in your watch history
App signature not spoofed for feed videos\n\nFeed videos will play for less than 1 minute before encountering playback issues

Storyboard not spoofed

Side effects include:
• No ambient mode
• Seekbar thumbnails are hidden
